subject: Order #SSN3566
description_text:
Hey!


Have my order been posted on your behalf or no?

conversations.body_text: Hi Jürgen Järveküla,    I apologize for not getting back to you sooner. Here is your shipping tracking link.  https://www.dhl.de/en/privatkunden/pakete-empfangen/verfolgen.html?piececode=CE326634499DE
